title: (x) Google search results - Arial {Alex}
content:
Google search results - anyone tell me what font this is, I’m being dumb and a bit lazy - Is it Arial?

:)

Thankyou in advance of your help!

 [‹ (x) U2 Vertigo dvd stencil font - House Broken Clean {Tiff}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420064728/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17947 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Google search results - Arial {Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420064728/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17942 "Go to next forum topic")
author: MekOne

comments.content:
Here’s the relevant line from the CSS stylesheet:

{font-family:arial,sans-serif }
